info.bio: I'm a full-stack developer, I love to build things and solve problems. I'm passionate about technology and I'm always looking for new things to learn.

services.title: Web Development
services.description: I can build you a website from scratch or help you with your existing website. I have experience with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Node.js, Express, and MongoDB.

services.title: web optimization
services.description: I can help you optimize your website for speed and SEO. I have experience with performance optimization, image optimization, and SEO best practices.

services.title: Design
services.description: I can help you with your design needs. I have experience with Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator, and Figma.

services.title: Consulting
services.description: I can help you with your tech-related problems. I have experience with web development, design, and more.

projects.title: Kouralink
projects.description: KouraLink is a platform for football enthusiasts. It connects players and teams from all over the world, allowing them to form teams, organize matches, and participate in tournaments.

projects.title: Scrapy
projects.description: Scrapy is a web scraping tool that allows you to extract data from some websites . It's fast, powerful, and easy to use.

projects.title: HandyScript
projects.description: A set of useful Javascript modules that extends the javascript core context.

experience.title: Stage in Wilaya Marrakech Safi
experience.description: As an intern at Wilaya Marrakech Safi, I had the opportunity to contribute to humanitarian efforts following the earthquake in Al Haouz. My mission was to capture crucial information for the people affected by the natural disaster.
